description: All travellers to the island will have to self-isolate for 14 days from Thursday.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey enforces mandatory self-isolation for travellers
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey enforces mandatory self-isolation for travellers - BBC News
maintext: "I hope Islanders will welcome these measures as firm steps to protect their health and especially the health of the most vulnerable in our community," he added.
